Posts.Content: Jerry: As one who was just diagnosed this past April and have learned so much, you will find that with your diagnosis you are sitting well and there is no need to rush. Read, learn, get another opinion, etc. And as you do, you will understand better what your path forward is.
Posts.Signature: Age 56 March 2018 uro DRE detected; Biopsy April 2018 6/12 positive adenocarcinoma; 4 (3+3) and 2 (3 + 4); PSA 2.7; Bone Scan and MRI suggested all contained; Radical on July 5, 2018; ½ nerves spared; Post Biopsy confirmed all contained; lymph nodes and nerves all negative. 09/20/2018 PSA <.01 01/04/2019 PSA <.01
